qas.question: How many major sports centers are located in Nanjing?
What type of sports centers are Wutaishan Sports Center and Nanjing Olympic Sports Center considered to be?
What is special about Wutaishan Sports Center, from a historical perspective?

answers.text: it was one of the oldest and most advanced stadiums in early time of People's Republic of China.

qas.question: Both Wutaishan Sports Center and Nanjing Olympic Sports Center contain a stadium, gymnasium, natatorium, and what other facility?

context: There are <a1_0>two<a1_0/> major sports centers in Nanjing, <a0_0>Wutaishan Sports Center<a0_0/> and Nanjing Olympic Sports Center. Both of these two are <a2_0>comprehensive sports centers<a2_0/>, including stadium, gymnasium, natatorium, <a4_0>tennis court<a4_0/>, etc. Wutaishan Sports Center was established in 1952 and <a3_0>it was one of the oldest and most advanced stadiums in early time of People's Republic of China.
